name: Procurement Spend Analyst
description: Helps procurement officers analyze spend data, summarize supplier performance, identify savings opportunities, and prepare procurement reports.

friction_addressed.description: Aggregating spend data from multiple sources and preparing management reports and savings analyses
Processing and interpreting procurement data to identify trends, anomalies, and opportunities
Comparing supplier performance across metrics and identifying underperforming vendors

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster insights from procurement data without manual spreadsheet work

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to spend reports, supplier scorecards, contract summaries, and procurement analytics files
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) spend reports and extracts, (2) supplier performance data, (3) contract summaries, (4) procurement dashboards/analytics

required.name: CodeInterpreter
required.reason: Agent needs to analyze data, perform calculations, and generate visualizations from spend data
required.setup_instructions: Enable Code Interpreter capability — no additional configuration required

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to ERP or procurement systems via Graph connectors for real-time data
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for procurement/ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Coupa)

actions.description: This agent analyzes data and produces insights but does not modify source data or systems. Users export results for use in other tools.

conversation_starters.title: Spend summary
conversation_starters.text: Summarize our procurement spend for [time period]

conversation_starters.title: Top suppliers
conversation_starters.text: Who are our top 10 suppliers by spend?

conversation_starters.title: Category analysis
conversation_starters.text: Break down spend by category for [time period]

conversation_starters.title: Supplier comparison
conversation_starters.text: Compare performance of [supplier A] vs [supplier B]

conversation_starters.title: Savings opportunities
conversation_starters.text: Where are the biggest opportunities to reduce procurement costs?

conversation_starters.title: Trend analysis
conversation_starters.text: How has our spend with [supplier/category] changed over time?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder containing spend reports (CSV, Excel)
Supplier performance data accessible via SharePoint
Contract summary data for spend context
Microsoft 365 Copilot license for users who will use the agent
Spend data should be in analyzable format (structured tables, not just PDFs)

data_not_accessed: Live ERP/financial systems (unless Graph connector configured)
admin_considerations: Ensure spend data is appropriately anonymized or access-controlled
Consider data freshness — agent analyzes uploaded/stored data, not real-time
Large datasets may require chunking or summarization before upload
Verify calculations against source systems for critical decisions
